title: 'Boys and Girl - Aldon Smith Signing/Expectations; Draft Prospect Interviews
itunes:title: 'Boys and Girl - Aldon Smith Signing/Expectations; Draft Prospect Interviews
description:
On today’s episode of the 'Boys and Girl Podcast, Jane and Bobby discuss Dallas’ addition of long-exiled pass rusher Aldon Smith. Can it work with the Cowboys? Plus, Jane and Bobby chat with Texas A&M defensive tackle Justin Madubuike, UCLA tight end Devin Asiasi, LSU edge rusher K’Lavon Chaisson, and Wyoming linebacker Logan Wilson. Follow Jane and Bobby on Twitter and subscribe to get all the latest inside information from two of the most connected people in the Cowboys’ community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
